--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Unicron:
> 
> "IF your jugdement hadnt sense, I dont mind to recomend a punishmet 
> Scourge, so I strongly recomend watch your tongue and remember what 
> is your place" Hissed Unicron, Nightstrike and Darke fate looked 
> Scourge willing to kill him and Unicron continue "Now if you 
> suggested the strategy, what are you waitting to run it?"

Vorpral looked over at Scourge and then at Cyclonus a small smile
stretching across his face, one that faded before he turned to look
once again at Unicron. 

"Sir!" Cyclonus spoke up after flashing Scourge an energon curdling
glance. "Scourge has been under his share of battle stress, and is
still recovering." Cyclonus grasped Scourge's shoulder causing him to
wince, "But you must admit sir, he has a small point." 

Cyclonus stood allowing Scourge to fall to the floor holding his
shoulder. 

Cyclonus looked at Unicron, "So far as we can tell the Predicons have
done little so far to take advantage of what has happened, so we cannot
be sure just how much of a help or distraction they would be."

Cyclonus stroked his chin thoughtfully, "We do have our five soldiers
on the planet, but so far they have reported nothing unusual as far as
the predicons." Cyclonus paused and then continued, "Perhaps we can
redirect them to investigate predicon activities?"

Vorpral chuckled, "If the Maximals dare attack us here, they will see
just what sort of defences we have. The Searing Eye may have been dim,
but it has not be motionless." 

Cyclonus nodded as if his suspisions had been confirmed but continued
talking with Unicron, "As always sir we look to you for guidance."

Vorpral nodded in agreement, even as Scourge did the same, his optics
dim and and never leaving the ground.

Preston
(Da'minion)
